abstract: Also, a new editor from the digital world at USA Today, and two more journalists arrested in London in bribing investigation.
snippet: Also, a new editor from the digital world at USA Today, and two more journalists arrested in London in bribing investigation.
lead_paragraph: NBC and Facebook are expected to announce a partnership Wednesday  to collaborate on Olympic coverage, writes Brian Stelter. NBC will feature data from Facebook in its broadcasts as an attempt to tap into the social media conversation, and Facebook will feature exclusive content on NBC’s Olympic pages.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Viacom vs. DirecTV, North Korea vs. Disney
